name: are you hurt? OR how to drink water when you're depressed
name_original: are you hurt? OR how to drink water when you're depressed
description:
pitch

you play as a recent divorcee, oliver berninger, devoted chef who in the wake of his break up, attempts to engage in society once more, finding peace and meaning in the middle of a bit of a low point in his life.

credits
  • diego flórez: soundscape composition & design
  • spencer baughman: writing, art, programming & design

we're apart of the locally sourced winter 2020-2021 bundle! if you'd like early access to episode 3 as well as 12 other beautiful experiments from other michigan based developers, consider dropping some coin! alternatively once the bundle is over, are you hurt? will be made available to all without a paywall.

a special thanks to...
  • bryan devendorf
  • "conversation 16"
  • self-actualization
